Teapod is coming

12 September 2020

418, I’m a teapod is a podcast with 2 friends talking about work, coffee, dogs and life.

Luke is the fun one and Toto is the chatty one.

Stay tuned for a first episode coming soon! In the meantime don’t forget to follow us on twitter at @418teapod.
